title: Creating a Custom Security in Office Cloud
text:
A custom security (or user-defined security) represents a holding not found in the Morningstar database. Custom securities can help you accurately review and report on all securities held by your clients. You can create and manage custom securities as client holdings.

To create a custom security, do the following:

In the upper-left corner of the Morningstar Office Cloud window, from the Menu, select Securities. The Securities page opens.







In the header, click the Add Security icon. The Create Custom Security window opens.







At the top of the window, make sure Basic is selected. Then enter information in the various fields.

Note: In most of the fields, you can make a selection from a menu.



Be sure to select and review the options on each of the tabs.



At the top of the window, select Detail. Then enter information in the various fields.

Note: In most of the fields, you can make a selection from a menu. At the top of the window, select Price Information. Then enter information in the various fields.

Note: In most of the fields, you can make a selection from a menu. When you are finished, in the upper-right corner, click Done.
